channel.title: My RuneScape History
channel.description:
Well.. I think I should share my beautiful experience too.
Okay, so it all started when I logged in. When I logged in, there was some retarded guy.. so I spoke to him, and he's all like "welcz to scaperune, this 1 is tutz land, go do tutz n cum back on me, and speak to my face"
so.. after 3 long days, I finished that tutorial and was welcomed into the world of RuneScape.
Once there, I found my self in some retarded castle in a place called "lumberjackbridge".. I then fell over a rock but to surprise I saw a person named zizema with a PHat on saying "Take my hand", with his colorful hat shining. I said "can i trust you", and he said "Don't worry, my hand is level 99." I didn't know what it mean't at the time, but he was talking to beautifully, it was like he had a level 99 voice or something. Anyways, once up he said follow me, so I followed, he then took me into this dark place called the wilderness and took me far, far, far, we encountered these wierd nigger ghost, which he defeated himself, while protecting me.
He then killed me. I found myself back where I started.. so I just logged off, and haven't logged on since. Don't ask how the fuck I got to this site..

item.title: My RuneScape History
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:22, topic:349893”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=446268.msg3287557#msg3287557 date=1280300519]
Well then they break the TOS. And also, unless you actually host the client, you’re doing nothing wrong.
[/quote]

Hosting a server is illegal, most servers haven’t even re written the Cryption and Stream Class to be considered 100% our code.[/quote]

An alternative to the Cryption class:
http://mscp.pastebin.com/yrYUzPFp

An alternative to the Stream class:
http://mscp.pastebin.com/ga21dH3p

Both of those are more efficient than the originals, plus they’re legal.

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape History
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:13, topic:349893”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=446268.msg3285594#msg3285594 date=1280181252]

It is VERY hazerdous to your accounts to post them on a website that is against jagex’s terms of service.

It is VERY hazerdous to your dignity to post on a website when you have no idea what you are talking about.
[/quote]
Intellectual property rights

[quote]Jagex®, RuneScape® and FunOrb® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software or attempt to sub-license it. You must not create or provide any other means by which any Jagex Product may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

Materials (including without limit all information, software, data, text, photographs, graphics, sound and video) placed on any Jagex Product by us or on our behalf are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights of ourselves or our business partners / suppliers / advertisers. You may not use these materials or any Jagex Product except in accordance with these terms and conditions and for personal (i.e. non-commercial) use only.

You agree that all intellectual property or other rights in any game character, account and items are and will remain our property.

By posting chat or other materials on any Jagex Product, you grant us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty free, worldwide license to use and/or modify such materials on any Jagex Product as we see fit.

You agree that by submitting any material of any kind to us for any purpose connected with any Jagex Product (non-exhaustive examples are suggestions and ideas for any game or contributions to any Gallery page), you are giving us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free license to use and/or modify the submitted materials as we see fit. You agree to waive any moral rights to the extent permitted by law and that you will not withdraw the submission or attempt to make a charge for its use. Furthermore you guarantee that you are the exclusive copyright holder in relation to the submission and that the submission in no way breaches the rights of any other person or entity.[/quote]

Moparscape is based off of modifying jagex’s property, if you’re part of the community then i’m sure at one point you have dealed with an illegal client of jagex’s [/quote]

It’s not an illegal client of JaGeX’s if you’ve never touched it. And stop talking in bold.

Read full topic

Then i saw a nigger first tiem in ma lief i was like WAZDOWN GEE LETS ROEL WID DEM EASE SADERZ FOO’ but he sey u r no nigah so he kik me sq in de balls :’(:’( so i get piss and go to scaepscaep COE goergoe bush and 3 DE NIGGAH BEN SOON TOUCH ROED n they kik me sq in de balls to :’( so i go to pure2ownage’s PHO and relaxed in his QH with justinxg27 in wich dey giv me ak 47 with a RPG-19 binladien versoin so i r naem ma self BIN LADEIN!@ tehn i go steel some iron dragonz from their lair and crash into G.E. 2 tiems and i stiel liev.
kthnxbai[/quote]poor kid.[/quote]that was a little fucked up :\

item.title: My RuneScape History
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

I was in 6th grade 2006, April 9th to be exact, all my good friends where talking about this game called “RoomSkate” (I didn’t know it was RuneScape) I said it sounded stupid, I was talking to one of my closest friends Tyler about it and he gave me the website, next day at the bookfair whe had every semester I was on the library computer and made my first account “Doggy36” played on the tutorial, quit that for a few days, then on April 15th I got my first own computer and decided to play RuneScape again, so I made a new account “Natecole4” played that for a few days, quit that, then around April 20th my friend asked if I wanted a level 12 account with some black stuff on it, I took it and that was my main from 2006-2008 (I still have it too) I quit him once my good friend Nate (LOL) and I started sharing our old account, Nest81, we also shared his staker account Som 1s b4ck and his main Aclaw (ranked #1 attack) after his 2 accounts got keylogged we got nest81 from level 76-96 in a whole summer, then that account got locked for chargeback fees and is locked.
My current main Pker0000888 was my dads girlfriends sons and I account, we made it to share and work on together, which is one of my current 2 mains.
We’ve made that account pretty bad-ass, so that’s ny story o.-

Here are my mains:

Read full topic
